-| wceq(cfv(cpadd, c0), cfv(cpadd, c0))
-| wceq(c6, cfv(cple, c0))
-| wceq(c8, cfv(cmee, c0))

|- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, chlt), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4)), wbr(c1, c6, c5)), wceq(co(c1, c7, co(c3, c8, c5)), co(co(c1, c7, c3), c8, c5)))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(c7, cfv(cjn, c0))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(catm, c0))
-| wceq(c6, cfv(cple, c0))
-| wceq(c8, cfv(cmee, c0))

comment: Version of modular law ~ pmod1i that holds in a Hilbert lattice, when one element is an atom. (Contributed by NM, 11-May-2012.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-May-2013.)
